WRITING.TITLE: Sniper Ghost warrior shoots itself in the foot
WRITING.TEXT:
Im not going to lie, when it actually works, its a lot of fun. In pure gameplay terms, i have enjoyed it far more than say ghost recon wildlands.
But as much as ive enjoyed it a lot, man does it ever try hard to make you hate it.
It takes five minutes to load into each region. Ive never had a game freeze so many times on me, only to have to reload the game adding another five mins loading. Glitches such as most wanted enemies ive killed not counting even though they still show up. Being dead though they are impossible to kill again.
Its a real love hate experience. If they had ironed out the massive technical errors, and im someone whos quite forgiving usually on that front, it would have reviewed far better.
Gameplay is an 8, but the tech side drags it down to 6. It seems it should have opened with "made despite cry engine" considering how hard thats said to be to use.
I truly hope the franchise gets another shot, hopefully with a better engine. Theres a damn fun game beneath all the sorry technical messes
